languages.text: "Ты не испорчен коростой скверны, но сам стал монстром, что не найдет успокоения... Зачем?"

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Ты не испорчен коростой скверны, но сам стал монстром, что не найдет успокоения... Зачем?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"
languages.original_text: "Ты не испорчен коростой скверны, но сам стал монстром, что не найдет успокоения... Зачем?"

traits.locale_text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"
"You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"
"You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"
"You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"
"You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"
"You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"

languages.text: "Ihr seid nicht gezeichnet von den Wunden der Verderbnis und doch willentlich zu einem Monster geworden, das keine Ruhe findet ... Warum?"
languages.original_text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nicht gezeichnet von den Wunden der Verderbnis und doch willentlich zu einem Monster geworden, das keine Ruhe findet ... Warum?"

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes pas souillé par la corruption, et pourtant, vous avez vous-même choisi de devenir un monstre qui ne connaîtra plus jamais le repos... Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes pas souillé par la corruption, et pourtant, vous avez vous-même choisi de devenir un monstre qui ne connaîtra plus jamais le repos... Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: “你没有被腐化的力量侵蚀，可你还是选择沦为了怪物，不得安宁……为什么要这样？”
languages.original_text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"

traits.locale_text: “你没有被腐化的力量侵蚀，可你还是选择沦为了怪物，不得安宁……为什么要这样？”

languages.text: «No está asolado por las costras de la corrupción, y aun así decidió convertirse en un monstruo que jamás conocería el descanso... ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"

traits.locale_text: «No está asolado por las costras de la corrupción, y aun así decidió convertirse en un monstruo que jamás conocería el descanso... ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: 「あなたは腐敗のかさぶたに覆われてはいませんが、それでも決して安らぐことのないモンスターとなる道を選びました…なぜですか？」
languages.original_text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは腐敗のかさぶたに覆われてはいませんが、それでも決して安らぐことのないモンスターとなる道を選びました…なぜですか？」

languages.text: "Yozlaşmanın yaralarıyla lekelenmemişsin ama yine de huzur bulamayacak bir canavara dönüşmeyi seçtin... Neden?"
languages.original_text: "You are not marred by the scabs of corruption, but you still chose to become a monster who would find no rest... Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Yozlaşmanın yaralarıyla lekelenmemişsin ama yine de huzur bulamayacak bir canavara dönüşmeyi seçtin... Neden?"
